definition: sign with a mark instead of a name
details:
verb
- sign with a mark instead of a name
- decorate manuscripts with letters painted red
= example: decorate manuscripts with letters painted red
= synonyms: miniate
- furnish with rubrics or regulate by rubrics
= example: furnish with rubrics or regulate by rubrics
- place in the church calendar as a red-letter day honoring a saint
= example: place in the church calendar as a red-letter day honoring a saint
